title: KSM SDK: Python (Comprehensive)
description: A comprehensive guide to the Keeper Secrets Manager Python SDK. Covers setup, auth (token, file, Base64 config), caching, record lifecycle (create, retrieve, update, delete), password generation, file operations (upload, download, delete), and folder management (create, list, update, delete).

steps.title: Step 5: Folder Management & Record Deletion (with Caching)
